sentences.sContent: Life is happier if it is full of easiness and assuredness.
sentences.sContent_eng: Life is happier if it is full of easiness and assuredness.
sentences.sCn: 生命是非常美好的，如果生活中充满了从容与自信的话。

sentences.sContent: Yellow is a traditional tie colour in countries, including England, which can signal assuredness, along with radiance and vitality, he said.
sentences.sContent_eng: Yellow is a traditional tie colour in countries, including England, which can signal assuredness, along with radiance and vitality, he said.
sentences.sCn: 他说，在很多国家，包括在英国，黄色是传统的领带色。它给人一种自信、活力的跃动感。

words.tran: 保证的；确信的；使人有信心的
保证；担保；使确信；弄清楚
